vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πνικ-τός, ή, όν,
strangled, [NT]
__2 air-tight, [Refs 2nd c.BC+] adverb -τῶς[Refs]
__II baked or stewed [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: strangled, choked; (n.) meat of strangled animals
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
strangled, choked; (n.) meat of strangled animals
strangled, suffocated;, in NT τὸ πνικτόν, the flesh of animals killed by strangulation or suffocation, Acts 15:20, 29; 21:25*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: estrangulado (de animales sacrificados para comida sin desangrarlos)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 窒息死亡的, 勒死的
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 窒息死亡的, 勒死的
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thú vật chết ngạt; thú vật chết ngột. Xem G4155
